attributes.action: Rescind the knighthood for Gavin Williamson
attributes.additional_details: Gavin Williamson was inept as Education Secretary causing untold stress to students and teachers due to last minute decisions and poor management. To confer a knighthood for ineptitude debases the honours system.
attributes.background: To reverse the decision to give Gavin Williamson a knighthood which is undeserved

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
